parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1 </name>=<value> Markers

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns marker position. See also [[setMarkerPos]].
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature </title><part><name index="1"/><value> Informative </value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> This command is identical to [[markerPos]].</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getMarkerPos]] markerName

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [x,y,0]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> [[getMarkerPos]] [markerName, preserveElevation] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.93</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> [markerName, preserveElevation]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> markerName: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> preserveElevation (Optional): [[Boolean]] Default: [[false]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGL]] if ''preserveElevation'' is [[true]] or [x,y,0] if ''preserveElevation'' is [[false]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_mPos1 = [[getMarkerPos]] "markerOne";</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_mPos2 = [[getMarkerPos]] ["markerTwo", [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setMarkerPos]], [[setMarkerPosLocal]]
</value></part></template>
